DMgrassMax.Description: Maximum DM production of grass monoculture

DMcloverMax.Description: Maximum DM production of clover monoculture

GrassNconcMin.Description: Minimum N concentration in harvestable grass DM

GrassNconcMax.Description: Maximum N concentration in harvestable grass DM

CloverNconcMax.Description: Maximum N concentration in harvestable clover DM

fixationEfficiency.Description: Efficiency with which N fixation satisfies N uptake deficit in clover

CloverDMdeclineFactor.Description: Increases (>1.0) or decreases (<1.0) the rate of decline in clover DM production for a unit increase in grass DM production

nonHarvRatioGrass.Description: Ratio of non-harvestable grass DM production to harvestable DM production

nonHarvRatioClover.Description: Ratio of non-harvestable cloverDM production to harvestable DM production

GrassNonharvestableNconc.Description: N concentration in nonharvestable grass DM

CloverNonharvestableNconc.Description: N concentration in nonharvestable clover DM

uptakeWeightingFactor.Description: Increase to increase grass mineral N uptake relative to clover

lossFrac.Description: Proportion of the crop residue N removed (not available as mineral N)

steps.Description: Number of N fertiliser application rates
